title: Trump summoned by January 6th committee
description: The former president is ordered to testify under oath by 14th November. Also: Giorgia Meloni is to become the first far-right leader in decades to be sworn in as Italian prime minister, and a wild bison is born in Britain for what's thought to be the first time since the Ice Age.
itunes:subtitle: The former president is ordered to testify under oath by 14th November
itunes:summary: The former president is ordered to testify under oath by 14th November. Also: Giorgia Meloni is to become the first far-right leader in decades to be sworn in as Italian prime minister, and a wild bison is born in Britain for what's thought to be the first time since the Ice Age.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
